tweet_text: @AutSciPerson This on top of sleep problems means there are times when I don't realize I'm burning out until I've had headaches and barely eaten for several days in a row. You're right that it just isn't the same as abled, NT stress. Thank you for articulating it so well!

tweet_text: @shankyaphane I'm so disheartened. I was made to feel incompetent and undeserving of the job, almost had me second guessing myself but I let it be known that I stand by my words and would not be bullied to take anything back.

tweet_text: @sensible_gunner In terms of purely judging a player, Im with you. Market value, above market value, doesn’t matter. Once he’s signed you judge him on performances, not the fee (that’s on the club). My opinion is Arteta ID’d him as a player worth spending 50m on, so I need to see that reflected

tweet_text: @JJBASoundDesign True, but I was thoroughly annoyed that literally every single red saber in the entire series all made Kylo's lightsaber sound. It's a cool sound, but it's so lazy for them to just slap it onto every bad guy especially considering there's a specific reason his makes that noise.
text_en: True, but I was thoroughly annoyed that literally every single red saber in the entire series all made Kylo's lightsaber sound. It's a cool sound, but it's so lazy for them to just slap it onto every bad guy especially considering there's a specific reason his makes that noise.
